scripts.dev: node ./scripts/kill-port.mjs 8787 && concurrently -n web,api -c "#00bcd4,#8bc34a" "vite --host" "npm --prefix team-schedule-api run dev"
scripts.dev:all-legacy: node ./scripts/kill-port.mjs 8787 && concurrently -n web,proxy -c "#00bcd4,#8bc34a" "vite --host" "npm --prefix dev-server run dev"
scripts.predeploy: npm run build && cp -f public/CNAME dist/CNAME && mkdir -p dist/schedule2 && cp -a dist/assets dist/schedule2/ && cp -f dist/sw.js dist/schedule2/sw.js
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix team-schedule-api ci || npm --prefix team-schedule-api i
